SELECT ZWTC.OBJID, ZWTC.TASK_NO, ZWTC.SLOC_NO, ZWTC.SLOC_PLC_NO, ZWTC.ELOC_NO, ZWTC.ELOC_PLC_NO, ZWTC.CREATION_DATE, ZWTC.EXCUTE_DATE, ZWTC.FINISH_DATE, ZWTC.ERR_NAME, ZWTC.PRODUCT_NO, ZWTC.PALLET_NO, CASE ZWTC.CMD_TYPE WHEN 'I' THEN '入库' WHEN 'O' THEN '出库' ELSE '异常' END CMD_TYPE, NVL(ZWPD.MATERIAL_NO, WPD.MATERIAL_NO) AS MATER_NO, NVL(ZWPD.BATCH_NO, WPD.BATCH_NO) AS BATCH_NO, NVL(ZWPD.MATER_TYPE, WPD.MATER_TYPE) AS MATER_TYPE FROM Z50_WBS_TASK_CMD ZWTC LEFT JOIN Z50_WBS_PACKAGE_DATA ZWPD ON ZWPD.PACKAGE_GUID = ZWTC.PACKAGE_GUID LEFT JOIN WBS_PACKAGE_DATA WPD ON WPD.PACKAGE_GUID = ZWTC.PACKAGE_GUID
ZWTC.TASK_NO like '%'||#where.TASK_NO#||'%'
ZWTC.SLOC_PLC_NO like '%'||#where.SLOC_PLC_NO#||'%'
ZWTC.PALLET_NO like '%'||#where.PALLET_NO#||'%'
ZWTC.CREATION_DATE >=#where.BTIME#
ZWTC.CREATION_DATE <= 1+#where.ETIME#
ORDER BY ZWTC.OBJID DESC

SELECT ZWTC.OBJID, ZWTC.TASK_NO, ZWTC.SLOC_NO, ZWTC.SLOC_PLC_NO, ZWTC.ELOC_NO, ZWTC.ELOC_PLC_NO, ZWTC.CREATION_DATE, ZWTC.EXCUTE_DATE, ZWTC.FINISH_DATE, ZWTC.ERR_NAME, ZWTC.PRODUCT_NO, ZWTC.PALLET_NO, CASE ZWTC.CMD_TYPE WHEN 'I' THEN '入库' WHEN 'O' THEN '出库' ELSE '异常' END CMD_TYPE, NVL(ZWPD.MATERIAL_NO, WPD.MATERIAL_NO) AS MATER_NO, NVL(ZWPD.BATCH_NO, WPD.BATCH_NO) AS BATCH_NO, NVL(ZWPD.MATER_TYPE, WPD.MATER_TYPE) AS MATER_TYPE FROM Z50_WBS_TASK_CMD ZWTC LEFT JOIN Z50_WBS_PACKAGE_DATA ZWPD ON ZWPD.PACKAGE_GUID = ZWTC.PACKAGE_GUID LEFT JOIN WBS_PACKAGE_DATA WPD ON WPD.PACKAGE_GUID = ZWTC.PACKAGE_GUID
ZWTC.OBJID = #where.OBJID#
ORDER BY ZWTC.OBJID DESC
